entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -19.4°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 36 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
